dpia:hasElement.name: projectAim
dpia:hasElement.description: What is the aim of the project?

dpia:hasElement.name: linkedToAnotherProject
dpia:hasElement.description: Does this project link to another project?

dpia:hasElement.name: linkedProjectDPIACompleted
dpia:hasElement.description: Has a DPIA been completed on the linked project?

dpia:hasElement.name: linkedProjectName
dpia:hasElement.description: What is the name of the project this links to?

dpia:hasElement.name: usingPersonalData
dpia:hasElement.description: Will you be using any personal data?

dpia:hasElement.name: processedPersonalData
dpia:hasElement.description: What personal data will be processed?

dpia:hasElement.name: otherPersonalData
dpia:hasElement.description: Other (please specify)

dpia:hasElement.name: relyingConditions
dpia:hasElement.description: Which of the following condition(s) are you relying upon?

dpia:hasElement.name: consentCollectionWithdrawal
dpia:hasElement.description: If you are relying on consent to process personal data, how will this be collected and what will you do if it is withheld or withdrawn?

dpia:hasElement.name: multipleLawfulBasis
dpia:hasElement.description: If you have selected more than one lawful basis for processing personal data because there is more than one processing activity, please give further detail about each activity and why you consider more than one lawful basis applicable

dpia:hasElement.name: legalObligationJustification
dpia:hasElement.description: If you are using legal obligation or public task as your lawful basis, please specify what legislation is being used to justify this.

dpia:hasElement.name: specialCategoryDataIncluded
dpia:hasElement.description: Does the data include special category data?

dpia:hasElement.name: includedSpecialCategoryData
dpia:hasElement.description: Which special category data is included?

dpia:hasElement.name: relyingConditionsSpecialCategory
dpia:hasElement.description: Which of the following conditions are you relying upon to process the special category data?

dpia:hasElement.name: multipleLawfulBasisSpecialCategory
dpia:hasElement.description: If you have selected more than one lawful basis for processing Special Category Data because there is more than one processing activity, please give further detail about each activity and why you consider more than one lawful basis applicable

dpia:hasElement.name: substantialPublicInterestConditions
dpia:hasElement.description: What are the substantial public interest conditions?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataIncludesChildrenOrVulnerableGroups
dpia:hasElement.description: Does the data include children or other vulnerable groups? Select multiple options if applicable

dpia:hasElement.name: dataCollectionMethod
dpia:hasElement.description: How will you collect the data?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataUsage
dpia:hasElement.description: How will you use the data?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataSubjectExpectation
dpia:hasElement.description: Would data subjects expect you to use their data in this way?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataUsageFrequency
dpia:hasElement.description: How often will you use the data?

dpia:hasElement.name: otherDataUsage
dpia:hasElement.description: Other (Please specify)

dpia:hasElement.name: dataUsageExplanation
dpia:hasElement.description: Please explain how and why the data will be used this frequently. Please go into as much detail as possible

dpia:hasElement.name: dataUsageBenefits
dpia:hasElement.description: What are the benefits of using the data?

dpia:hasElement.name: affectedIndividualsCount
dpia:hasElement.description: How many individuals are affected?

dpia:hasElement.name: coversAllProcessingPurposes
dpia:hasElement.description: Does this DPIA cover all of the purposes for processing the data or is it likely to expand as the project develops?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataAlreadyHeld
dpia:hasElement.description: Is any of this data already held by your organization?

dpia:hasElement.name: currentDataUsagePurpose
dpia:hasElement.description: For what purpose is this data used for currently?

dpia:hasElement.name: newDataUsageCompatibility
dpia:hasElement.description: Is the new use of the data compatible with the original purpose?

dpia:hasElement.name: criminalOffencesProcessing
dpia:hasElement.description: Will you be processing data for the purposes of the prevention, investigation, detection or prosecution of criminal offences or the execution of criminal penalties, including the safeguarding against & the prevention of threats to public security?

dpia:hasElement.name: criminalOffencesDetails
dpia:hasElement.description: Please provide further details

dpia:hasElement.name: dataControllerIdentified
dpia:hasElement.description: Has the data controller been identified?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataController
dpia:hasElement.description: Who is the data controller?

dpia:hasElement.name: informationSharingAgreement
dpia:hasElement.description: Is an information sharing agreement in place?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataProcessorIdentified
dpia:hasElement.description: Has the data processor been identified?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataSharingWithinOrganization
dpia:hasElement.description: Will you be sharing data within your organization or an external service provider or third party?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataSharingParties
dpia:hasElement.description: Who will you share the data with?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataSharingMethod
dpia:hasElement.description: How will the data be shared?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataSharingPurpose
dpia:hasElement.description: For what purpose are you sharing the data?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataSharingSecurityMeasures
dpia:hasElement.description: What security measures have been put in place to ensure the data can be shared securely?

dpia:hasElement.name: projectDataFlowsCompleted
dpia:hasElement.description: Have the project data flows been completed?

dpia:hasElement.name: hasConsent
dpia:hasElement.description: Do you have consent to use the data in the way you're intending to?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataUseCommunication
dpia:hasElement.description: How do you intend to tell individuals about the use of their data?

dpia:hasElement.name: privacyNoticeAvailability
dpia:hasElement.description: Do you have a privacy notice?

dpia:hasElement.name: privacyNoticeAmendment
dpia:hasElement.description: Do you need to amend your privacy notices?

dpia:hasElement.name: privacyPolicyLink
dpia:hasElement.description: Provide a link to your privacy policy

dpia:hasElement.name: privacyPolicyUpload
dpia:hasElement.description: Upload the Privacy Policy to this DPIA

dpia:hasElement.name: marketingOptOut
dpia:hasElement.description: If the project involves marketing, is there a process in place for data subjects to opt out?

dpia:hasElement.name: optOutProcess
dpia:hasElement.description: What process will be put in place?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataNecessity
dpia:hasElement.description: What is the necessity of using the data?

dpia:hasElement.name: purposeAchievement
dpia:hasElement.description: Does the processing achieve your purpose?

dpia:hasElement.name: processingMethod
dpia:hasElement.description: How does the processing achieve your purpose?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataQuality
dpia:hasElement.description: Is the information you are using of good enough quality for the purposes it is used?

dpia:hasElement.name: alternativeDataUsage
dpia:hasElement.description: Is there another way to achieve the same outcome using less personal data?

dpia:hasElement.name: alternativeOptions
dpia:hasElement.description: What other options are available?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataAccuracyMaintenance
dpia:hasElement.description: How are you ensuring data is kept up to date and checked for accuracy and completeness?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataCorrectionProcess
dpia:hasElement.description: What is the process (administrative & technical) that enables necessary data corrections to be made?

dpia:hasElement.name: thirdPartyNotification
dpia:hasElement.description: What is the process (where relevant) for informing the third-party recipients of the data if data is corrected or erased?

dpia:hasElement.name: internalStakeholderConsultation
dpia:hasElement.description: Have you consulted with internal stakeholders?

dpia:hasElement.name: consultedStakeholders
dpia:hasElement.description: Which stakeholder(s) have you consulted?

dpia:hasElement.name: consultationProcess
dpia:hasElement.description: What was the consultation process?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataSubjectConsultation
dpia:hasElement.description: Have you consulted with data subjects (or their representatives if Children’s data is involved)?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataSubjectConsultationDetails
dpia:hasElement.description: Describe how you consulted with your data subjects – or justify why it was not appropriate to do so

dpia:hasElement.name: newITSolution
dpia:hasElement.description: Is this introducing a new IT solution, or a change to an existing IT process?

dpia:hasElement.name: newTechnologyIntroduced
dpia:hasElement.description: What new technology is being introduced?

dpia:hasElement.name: technologySupplier
dpia:hasElement.description: Who is the supplier of the technology?

dpia:hasElement.name: largeScaleMonitoring
dpia:hasElement.description: Will you be monitoring a publicly accessible place on a large scale?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataStorageLocation
dpia:hasElement.description: Where will the collected data be stored?

dpia:hasElement.name: physicalDataSecurity
dpia:hasElement.description: What physical security is in place to prevent access to the data?

dpia:hasElement.name: accessControls
dpia:hasElement.description: What are the access controls for staff, third parties, and data processors?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataRetentionDuration
dpia:hasElement.description: How long will the data be retained for?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataDeletionProcess
dpia:hasElement.description: What processes are in place to ensure information can be securely deleted/destroyed in relation to both paper and electronic files?

dpia:hasElement.name: processingConcerns
dpia:hasElement.description: Do you have any prior concerns over this type of processing or security flaws?

dpia:hasElement.name: concernDetails
dpia:hasElement.description: What are your concerns, and how will it affect the project?

dpia:hasElement.name: cloudServiceProvider
dpia:hasElement.description: Are you using a third-party Cloud Service Provider?

dpia:hasElement.name: dataProtectionRisksIdentification
dpia:hasElement.description: Identifying Data Protection Risks

dpia:hasElement.name: potentialImpact
dpia:hasElement.description: What is the potential impact? (from 10.1 Identifying Data Protection Risks)

dpia:hasElement.name: likelihoodOfHarmBeforeReduction
dpia:hasElement.description: What is the likelihood of harm before identifying ways to reduce the risk? (from 10.1 Identifying Data Protection Risks)

dpia:hasElement.name: severityOfHarmBeforeReduction
dpia:hasElement.description: What is the severity of harm likely to be before identifying ways to reduce the risk? (from 10.1 Identifying Data Protection Risks)

dpia:hasElement.name: riskReductionAction
dpia:hasElement.description: What action/existing risk reduction needs to be taken to reduce or eliminate the risk? (from 10.1 Identifying Data Protection Risks)

dpia:hasElement.name: actionOwner
dpia:hasElement.description: Who owns the action? (from 10.1 Identifying Data Protection Risks)

dpia:hasElement.name: actionCompletionDate
dpia:hasElement.description: What date will this be done (from 10.1 Identifying Data Protection Risks)

dpia:hasElement.name: likelihoodOfHarmAfterReduction
dpia:hasElement.description: What is the likelihood of harm after reducing the risk? (from 10.1 Identifying Data Protection Risks)
